narrative.narrative: La Compagnie is a Paris CDG based airline that started on July 21,2014. The initial route is CDG to Newark,NJ,USA and it started flying from London Luton to Newark on April 24,2015 also. It's CEO is Frantz Yvelin who founded L'Avion which was sold to British Airways and turned into OpenSkies. Those airlines are almost exactly the same, they fly/flew from Paris Orly to Newark, just using the other Paris airport as La Compagnie. They in fact use the same plane, the 757-200 of which it has two of.
